title: Deep elf fighter
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*For a list of all deep elves, see [list of deep elves](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves").*

| deep elf fighter e [![Deep elf fighter.png](/images/d/d9/Deep_elf_fighter.png)](/File:Deep_elf_fighter.png) |                                                                        |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                                              | 18-36                                                                  |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                                                  | 6                                                                      |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                                              | 190                                                                    |
| [Speed](/Movement "Movement")                                                                               | 10                                                                     |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                                          | 2                                                                      |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                                    | 12                                                                     |
| [MR](/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance")                                                                  | 40                                                                     |
| Attack1                                                                                                     | 9 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"))                                  |
| [Max Chunks](/Corpse "Corpse")                                                                              | 4                                                                      |
| [Type of Meat](/Corpse "Corpse")                                                                            | [Clean](/Category:Clean_corpse "Category:Clean corpse")                |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                                     | None                                                                   |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                                           | None                                                                   |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                                               | Land                                                                   |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                                                | [Human](/Category:Human_intelligence "Category:Human intelligence")    |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                                            | [Weapons & armour](/Category:Weapons_armour "Category:Weapons armour") |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                                            | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")      |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                                                        | [Medium](/Category:Medium_monsters "Category:Medium monsters")         |
| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                                                        | elf, elf                                                               |
| Flags                                                                                                       | [Fighter](/Fighter "Fighter")                                          |

|   |                                                                |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A strong deep elf soldier who wields weapons and battle magic. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Deep elf fighters** are weak, common [deep elves](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves") armed with decent gear and capable of the same magic as an [orc wizard](/Orc_wizard "Orc wizard"). They are most commonly found in the [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls"), [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults") and some [baileys](/Bailey "Bailey").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                              |                                                     |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart") (3d4) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Slow](/Slow "Slow")                         | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Haste](/Haste "Haste")                      | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                      | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

| Spell set II |                                                 |                                                     |
| :----------- | ----------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1        | [Throw Flame](/Throw_Flame "Throw Flame") (3d6) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2        | [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility")    | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3        | [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart") (3d4)    | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4        | [Confuse](/Confuse "Confuse")                   | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

| Spell set III |                                                 |                                                        |
| :------------ | ----------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| Slot1         | [Throw Frost](/Throw_Frost "Throw Frost") (3d6) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")    |
| Slot2         | [Cantrip](/Cantrip "Cantrip")                   | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")    |
| Slot3         | [Haste](/Haste "Haste")                         | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")    |
| Slot4         | [Throw Flame](/Throw_Flame "Throw Flame") (3d6) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")    |
| Slot5         | [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart") (3d4)    | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")    |
| Slot6         | [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility")    | [Emergency flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

Even with the slight boost to durability, they're still not much more dangerous than orc wizards.

## History

Deep elf fighters were removed in [0.18](/0.18 "0.18").
html:
Deep elf fighter

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For a list of all deep elves, see list of deep elves.

deep elf fighter e

 

HP 18-36
HD 6
XP 190
Speed 10
AC 2
EV 12
MR 40
Attack1 9 (hit)


Max Chunks 4
Type of Meat Clean
Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type elf, elf
Flags Fighter
A strong deep elf soldier who wields weapons and battle magic.


Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Deep elf fighters are weak, common deep elves armed with decent gear and capable of the same magic as an orc wizard. They are most commonly found in the Elven Halls, the Vaults and some baileys.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Magic Dart (3d4) Wizard flag
Slot2 Slow Wizard flag
Slot3 Haste Wizard flag
Slot4 Blink Wizard flag
Spell set II
Slot1 Throw Flame (3d6) Wizard flag
Slot2 Invisibility Wizard flag
Slot3 Magic Dart (3d4) Wizard flag
Slot4 Confuse Wizard flag
Spell set III
Slot1 Throw Frost (3d6) Wizard flag
Slot2 Cantrip Wizard flag
Slot3 Haste Wizard flag
Slot4 Throw Flame (3d6) Wizard flag
Slot5 Magic Dart (3d4) Wizard flag
Slot6 Invisibility Emergency flag

Tips & Tricks

Even with the slight boost to durability, they're still not much more dangerous than orc wizards.

History

Deep elf fighters were removed in 0.18.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Deep_elf_fighter&oldid=43767"
